alert.note: Alert for San Diego County Inland Valleys; San Diego County Mountains (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued November 24 at 7:53PM PST until November 25 at 12:00PM PST by NWS SanDiego
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON PST FRIDAY... * WHAT...East winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts to 45 mph. Local gusts of 60 to 70 mph are possible through late tonight on the coastal slopes. * WHERE...San Diego County Valleys and San Diego County Mountains. * WHEN...Until noon PST Friday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The strongest and most widespread winds will occur along the coastal mountain slopes and adjacent foothill areas.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: San Diego County Inland Valleys; San Diego County Mountains
